name: Lofthouse Clothing Oxagon Abstract T-shirt Blue
description:
This t-shirt features a hand-drawn abstract design and supports the Make a Wish foundation.

The t-shirt is printed on the finest cotton slim fit shits in Blue.

name: Lofthouse Clothing Hidden Tiger T-Shirt White
description:
This t-shirt features a Bengal tiger embedded amongst an abstract design and supports the Comic Relief campaign to vaccinate every child against deadly diseases.

The t-shirt is printed on the finest cotton slim fit shits in white.

name: Lofthouse Clothing Guardian Tree Oriental T-Shirt Blue
description:
Lofthouse Clothing's premium oriental t-shirt. A classic crew neck t-shirt featuring a large silhouette bonsai tree on the centre chest.

With this charity t-shirt you will be supporting our No Disaster Ignored movement to help those who need help most. For each t-shirt sold we give £2.50 toward the Red Cross.

name: Lofthouse Clothing Engraved Vertex Skull T-Shirt White
description:
Lofthouse Clothing's brand new premium skull t-shirt. A classic crew neck t-shirt featuring a highly detailed skull carving sculpture across the centre chest reminiscent of the Alexander McQueen t-shirt.

With this charity t-shirt you will be helping to vaccinate the world. Regardless of what you pay, for each t-shirt sold we give £2.50 to the Comic Relief Appeal to help vaccinate children against 5 deadly diseases.

name: Lofthouse Clothing Shaped Abstract T-Shirt
description:
This t-shirt features a hand drawn and textured abstract design and supports the Make a Wish foundation.

The t-shirt is printed on the finest cotton slim fit shits in white.

name: Lofthouse Clothing City Lights London T-Shirt White
description:
Lofthouse Clothing's premium city t-shirt. A classic crew neck t-shirt featuring the lights of London layered onto the Lofthouse Clothing Logo.

With this charity t-shirt you will be helping to conquer homelessness. Regardless of what you pay, for each t-shirt sold we give £2.50 toward purchasing Wellbeing packs supplied by Crisis.

name: Lofthouse Clothing T-Shirt Multibuy
description:
Buy ANY 2 t-shirts - Men or Ladies - for the incredibly low price of £34.99!

This covers all t-shirts we have on offer and includes free UK delivery.

Double charity donation for each purchase: £5 will be donated to our movements!

Once you purchase we will contact you for your t-shirt selection and sizes. 

**Please make sure you check the individual items to ensure they're still in stock**
